attributes.action: Nigel Farage for the Prime Ministers  hot seat.
attributes.additional_details:
23 years Nigel Farage has campaigned against the corruption and ever growing political union to get us free. He understands the Union better than anybody else in parliament. His back ground is stocks ,shares and politics. He is a man that tells things straight and wants the best for his country folk. 

We want the best for our Country folk and if a anyone who voted to remain is a shambles. 

Sign this quick and share it quicker 

We have the power to throw any government out of control.
attributes.background:
This man has campaigned  for 20 plus years to break away from the EU and nobody will suit the position more that this man. 

We need a a Brexiteer not a remain campaigner. 

Sign if you agree.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
